about_the_game:
Extend your world tour with the Trials® Rising - Expansion pass including 55+ additional tracks to master!

The pass will include all the following content:
- Samurai Items: enjoy extra customisation items to slash through the tracks with the spirits of ancient samurais to guide you!

- Stuntman Rider Pack: defy the laws of gravity and fly through rings of fire with this flashy costume.

- Ride accross the US along the famous Route 66 and explore the American southwest. The pack also includes the Touchdown outfit which lets you cross the finish line as an American football player.

- Go beyond the Equator to see the wonders of the Southern Hemisphere! Globe-trot your way from icy Antartica to the jungle-covered mountains of Peru and more!
detailed_description:
Extend your world tour with the Trials® Rising - Expansion pass including 55+ additional tracks to master!

The pass will include all the following content:
- Samurai Items: enjoy extra customisation items to slash through the tracks with the spirits of ancient samurais to guide you!

- Stuntman Rider Pack: defy the laws of gravity and fly through rings of fire with this flashy costume.

- Ride accross the US along the famous Route 66 and explore the American southwest. The pack also includes the Touchdown outfit which lets you cross the finish line as an American football player.

- Go beyond the Equator to see the wonders of the Southern Hemisphere! Globe-trot your way from icy Antartica to the jungle-covered mountains of Peru and more!

name: Trials® Rising - Expansion Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400, AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space

short_description: Extend your world tour with the Trials® Rising - Expansion pass including 55+ additional tracks to master! Enjoy additional content straight from launch day.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
